Judul: REPEAT CUSTOMER'S PERCEPTION ABOUT THE INCREASED PRICE COMPARED TO FACILITIES ADDITION GIVEN BY X HOTEL BANDUNG
Abstrak: In order to please the repeat guests, X Hotel Bandung has focused their marketing promotion to the repeat guests. The management concerns to the repeat guests perception about the additional price. It is very important to X Hotel bandung in evaluating this issue in order to keep the repeat guests to come back to X Hotel Bandung. X Hotel Bandung is able to increase satisfaction of repeat guests.
Kata Kunci: Customer perception, repurchase intentions, rebranding, increased price
